birth_place.zh-cn: 朝鲜王朝黄海道海州郡基洞
birth_place.en: Gidong, Haeju County, Hwanghae Province, Joseon

death_place.zh-cn: 韩国首尔特别市西大门区桥南洞
death_place.en: Gyonam-dong, Seodaemun District, Seoul, South Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国临时政府的领导人，被现代韩国人尊称为“韩国国父”。
description.en: A Korean independence activist, politician, and a leader of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea. He is revered by modern South Koreans as the 'Father of the Nation'.

en: Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，金九的前任大韩民国临时政府主席。
description.en: Korean independence activist, predecessor of Kim Gu as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，曾担任大韩民国临时政府主席，并劝说金九出任国务领。
description.en: Korean independence activist who served as President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea and persuaded Kim Gu to take the position of State Councillor.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国首任总统，在美国支持下建立韩国政府，与金九在统一问题上存在分歧。
description.en: The first President of South Korea, who established the South Korean government with U.S. support and had disagreements with Kim Gu over the issue of unification.

description.zh-cn: 金九出生时统治朝鲜半岛的王朝。
description.en: The dynasty that ruled the Korean Peninsula at the time of Kim Gu's birth.

description.zh-cn: 金九的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 金九逝世的城市。
description.en: The city where Kim Gu died.

description.zh-cn: 金九的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 金九等人于1928年成立的韩国独立运动政党，后于1940年与其他党派合并重组。
description.en: A Korean independence movement political party founded by Kim Gu and others in 1928, which later merged and reorganized with other parties in 1940.

en: Nationalist Government of the Republic of China
United States Army Military Government in Korea

description.zh-cn: 二战后在朝鲜半岛南部实行军事统治的美国机构，不支持大韩民国临时政府，并扶持李承晚政权。
description.en: The American agency that exercised military rule in the southern Korean Peninsula after World War II, did not support the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea, and backed the Syngman Rhee regime.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

en: Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations from North and South Korea

description.zh-cn: 暗杀金九的韩国陆军少尉。
description.en: The South Korean army lieutenant who assassinated Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，其政府于1962年追授金九建国勋章。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, whose government posthumously awarded the Order of Merit for National Foundation to Kim Gu in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人，曾与金九在四月南北联席会议上会面。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, who met with Kim Gu at the Joint Conference of North and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛19世纪的宗教运动组织，金九于1893年加入。
description.en: A 19th-century religious movement organization on the Korean Peninsula, which Kim Gu joined in 1893.

description.zh-cn: 安重根之父，曾在东学党起义失败后庇护金九。
description.en: Father of An Jung-geun, who sheltered Kim Gu after the failure of the Donghak Peasant Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中尉，被金九误认为是杀害明成皇后的凶手而将其杀死。
description.en: A Japanese army lieutenant who was killed by Kim Gu, who mistook him for the murderer of Empress Myeongseong.

description.zh-cn: 劝说金九越狱的朝鲜武官。
description.en: The Korean military officer who persuaded Kim Gu to escape from prison.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，与金九等人共同创建新民会和韩国独立党。
description.en: Korean independence activist who co-founded the Sinminhoe and the Korea Independence Party with Kim Gu and others.

description.zh-cn: 由安昌浩、金九等人于1907年成立的韩国秘密结社，旨在推动教育和产业，最终实现民族独立。
description.en: A Korean secret society founded in 1907 by An Changho, Kim Gu, and others, aimed at promoting education and industry to ultimately achieve national independence.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜日治时期统治朝鲜半岛的政权，是金九等独立运动家的主要斗争对象。
description.en: The regime that ruled the Korean Peninsula during the Japanese colonial period, and the main adversary of independence activists like Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 韩人社会党干部，被金九指使手下枪杀。
description.en: An official of the Korean People's Socialist Party, who was assassinated by order of Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 由金九在九一八事变后成立的敢死队，旨在通过暗杀等手段打击日本侵略者。
description.en: A secret organization founded by Kim Gu after the Mukden Incident, aimed at fighting against Japanese invaders through methods such as assassination.

description.zh-cn: 韩人爱国团成员，曾试图在东京刺杀日本天皇裕仁。
description.en: A member of the Korean Patriotic Corps who attempted to assassinate Emperor Hirohito in Tokyo.

description.zh-cn: 韩人爱国团成员，在上海虹口公园成功炸死多名日军高级将领。
description.en: A member of the Korean Patriotic Corps who successfully bombed and killed several high-ranking Japanese military officials in Shanghai's Hongkou Park.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国国民政府领导人，在虹口公园爆炸事件后大力支持金九的韩国独立运动。
description.en: Leader of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, who strongly supported Kim Gu's Korean independence movement after the Hongkou Park bombing.

nodes.id: 同盟国 (第二次世界大战)

zh-cn: 同盟国 (第二次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，其遗骸与李奉昌、尹奉吉一同被金九运回国安葬。
description.en: A Korean independence activist whose remains were returned to Korea for burial by Kim Gu, along with those of Lee Bong-chang and Yun Bong-gil.

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主党领导人，未参加四月南北联席会议。
description.en: Leader of the Korea Democratic Party who did not participate in the Joint Conference of North and South Korea.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 时任李承晚政府国防部长官，被指指示安斗熙暗杀金九。
description.en: The Minister of National Defense in the Syngman Rhee government, who was accused of ordering Ahn Doo-hee to assassinate Kim Gu.

position.zh-cn: 警务局长；内务总长；主席；国务委员会主席
position.en: Chief of Police Affairs Bureau; Minister of Home Affairs; President; Chairman of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 金九在不同时期担任大韩民国临时政府的多个要职，并长期是其实际领导人。
description.en: Kim Gu held several key positions in the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea at different times and was its de facto leader for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 金九接替洪震成为大韩民国临时政府主席。
description.en: Kim Gu succeeded Hong Jin as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 李东宁接替金九成为大韩民国临时政府主席，后金九又接替李东宁成为主席。
description.en: Yi Dong-nyeong succeeded Kim Gu as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea, and later Kim Gu succeeded Yi Dong-nyeong as Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚接替金九成为大韩民国临时政府主席。
description.en: Syngman Rhee succeeded Kim Gu as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九早年参加东学党起义，率领东学教徒在家乡举义。
description.en: In his early years, Kim Gu participated in the Donghak Peasant Revolution, leading Donghak followers in an uprising in his hometown.

description.zh-cn: 三一运动爆发后，金九流亡中国，参与筹建大韩民国临时政府。
description.en: After the outbreak of the March 1st Movement, Kim Gu went into exile in China and participated in the establishment of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在李东宁的劝说下，金九出任大韩民国临时政府国务领。
description.en: At the persuasion of Yi Dong-nyeong, Kim Gu took office as the State Councillor of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九领导的大韩民国临时政府与蒋中正领导的中华民国国民政府保持着良好的关系，并获得了其支持。
description.en: The Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea led by Kim Gu maintained a good relationship with the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China led by Chiang Kai-shek and received its support.

description.zh-cn: 金九与中国共产党保持着良好的关系。
description.en: Kim Gu maintained a good relationship with the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 美国军政府不承认大韩民国临时政府的合法性，并对金九等临时政府人员回国一事进行了封锁。
description.en: The U.S. Military Government did not recognize the legitimacy of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea and blocked the return of its members, including Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 美军政府在朝鲜半岛南部扶持李承晚建立亲美政权。
description.en: The U.S. Military Government supported Syngman Rhee in establishing a pro-American regime in the southern Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚建立南部“单独政府”，与金九的统一理念相悖。掌权后，李承晚势力通过“国会间谍案”等方式打击金九，最终金九被与李承晚政府有关的右翼分子暗杀。
description.en: Syngman Rhee established a 'separate government' in the south, which contradicted Kim Gu's unification ideals. After taking power, Rhee's faction attacked Kim Gu through incidents like the 'National Assembly spy case', and Kim Gu was ultimately assassinated by a right-wing extremist linked to Rhee's government.

description.zh-cn: 金九与金日成在平壤举行的“四月南北联席会议”上会面，商讨南北统一问题。
description.en: Kim Gu and Kim Il-sung met at the 'April Joint Conference of North and South' in Pyongyang to discuss the issue of Korean unification.

description.zh-cn: 安斗熙在金九的寓所将其开枪射杀。
description.en: Ahn Doo-hee shot and killed Kim Gu at his residence.

description.zh-cn: 时任韩国宪兵司令张兴在其自传中称，安斗熙是受时任国防部长官申性模的指示暗杀金九的。
description.en: According to the autobiography of Jang Heung, then commander of the Korean Military Police, Ahn Doo-hee assassinated Kim Gu under the orders of then Minister of National Defense Shin Sung-mo.

description.zh-cn: 安斗熙被指是受申性模的指示执行暗杀金九的任务。
description.en: Ahn Doo-hee was allegedly ordered by Shin Sung-mo to carry out the assassination of Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 朴正熙政府追授金九大韩民国建国勋章，并追尊其为韩国国父。
description.en: The Park Chung-hee government posthumously awarded Kim Gu the Order of Merit for National Foundation and honored him as the Father of the Nation.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国中央人民委员会追授金九祖国统一奖，以肯定他对南北统一的努力。
description.en: The Central People's Committee of the DPRK posthumously awarded Kim Gu the National Reunification Prize in recognition of his efforts for the unification of North and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 东学党起义受挫后，金九投靠安泰勋并受其庇护。
description.en: After the Donghak Peasant Revolution was suppressed, Kim Gu sought refuge with and was sheltered by An Tae-hun.

description.zh-cn: 金九认为土田让亮是杀害明成皇后的凶手或帮凶，为“为国母报仇”而将其杀死。
description.en: Believing Tsuchida Jōsuke was an assassin or accomplice in the murder of Empress Myeongseong, Kim Gu killed him to 'avenge the nation's mother'.

description.zh-cn: 考虑到金九是为国母报仇，朝鲜高宗在其死刑执行前特赦了他。
description.en: Considering that Kim Gu had acted to avenge the nation's mother, Emperor Gojong granted him a special pardon before his death sentence was carried out.

description.zh-cn: 在金周卿的劝说下，金九决定越狱。
description.en: At the persuasion of Kim Ju-gyeong, Kim Gu decided to escape from prison.

description.zh-cn: 安重根在哈尔滨火车站击毙了时任日本枢密院议长伊藤博文。
description.en: An Jung-geun assassinated Itō Hirobumi, then President of the Privy Council of Japan, at Harbin Railway Station.

description.zh-cn: 金九多次被日本当局逮捕入狱，包括因安重根事件和安明根事件。
description.en: Kim Gu was arrested and imprisoned by Japanese authorities multiple times, including in connection with the An Jung-geun incident and the An Myeong-geun incident.

description.zh-cn: 金九以“韩人社会党贪污列宁汇来的独立运动资金作他用”为由，指使手下在上海枪杀了金立。
description.en: On the grounds that the Korean People's Socialist Party had misappropriated independence movement funds from Lenin, Kim Gu ordered his subordinates to assassinate Kim Rip in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变后，为开辟新的斗争方式，金九成立了韩人爱国团敢死队。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, to open up new methods of struggle, Kim Gu established the Korean Patriotic Corps, a commando unit.

description.zh-cn: 李奉昌在东京樱田门向裕仁天皇投掷手榴弹，但未成功。
description.en: Lee Bong-chang threw a hand grenade at Emperor Hirohito at the Sakuradamon Gate in Tokyo, but the attempt failed.

description.zh-cn: 尹奉吉在上海虹口公园用炸弹炸死了日本上海派遣军司令白川义则大将。
description.en: Yun Bong-gil killed General Yoshinori Shirakawa, commander of the Shanghai Expeditionary Army, with a bomb in Shanghai's Hongkou Park.

description.zh-cn: 尹奉吉在上海虹口公园用炸弹炸死了上海日本居留民团团长河端贞次。
description.en: Yun Bong-gil killed Kawabata Sadatsugu, head of the Japanese Residents' Association in Shanghai, with a bomb in Shanghai's Hongkou Park.

description.zh-cn: 虹口公园爆炸事件后，蒋中正政府开始大力支持金九领导的韩国独立运动。
description.en: After the Hongkou Park bombing, the Chiang Kai-shek government began to strongly support the Korean independence movement led by Kim Gu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正秘密会见金九，并同意在中央陆军军官学校洛阳分校为韩国独立运动培养军事人才。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek met secretly with Kim Gu and agreed to train military personnel for the Korean independence movement at the Luoyang branch of the Central Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 韩国光复军是在中国国民党的支持下于重庆成立的。
description.en: The Korean Liberation Army was established in Chongqing with the support of the Kuomintang.

relationships.target: 同盟国 (第二次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国临时政府对日宣战，与同盟国结成反法西斯阵线。
description.en: The Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea declared war on Japan, forming an anti-fascist front with the Allied Powers.

description.zh-cn: 在金九回国前，周恩来等中共政要为其举行了送别宴会。
description.en: Before Kim Gu returned to Korea, CCP dignitaries including Zhou Enlai held a farewell banquet for him.

description.zh-cn: 为实现南北统一，金九前往平壤参加了“四月南北联席会议”。
description.en: To achieve the unification of North and South Korea, Kim Gu traveled to Pyongyang to participate in the 'April Joint Conference of North and South'.
